directions: Mix cream cheese, ham, green onions, and seasoned salt until evenly mixed; roll into a ball.
Spread chopped pecans onto a flat surface. Roll ham ball in chopped pecans to coat.
ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, slightly softened
1/4 teaspoon seasoned salt, or to taste
1 cup chopped pecans, or more to taste
title: Ham Ball
